title: Mendoza City Half Marathon 2025
details: The distances will be 21K and 10K, both competitive, and each runner will receive a competition kit that includes the official ASICS unisex T-shirt for the year 2025, a high-quality garment designed to provide comfort and style during the race. Additionally, there will be strategically located hydration stations along the course.Don't miss the opportunity to run the half marathon in our city!

title: DUKI EN MENDOZA AMERI WORLD TOUR
details: DUKI, a national artist, will perform and present his national tour in Mendoza
